parameters.name: Architecture
parameters.description:
System architecture. Allowed values:</br>

- x86_64.</br>

Currently, only x86_64 is supported.

parameters.name: ComputeType
parameters.description:
`Image Type`
ens_vm: ens virtual machine image (default)

parameters.name: DiskDeviceMapping
parameters.description: List of custom image information being created.

parameters.name: ImageFormat
parameters.description:
Image format. Allowed values:</br>
qcow2.</br>
Currently, only qcow2 is supported.

parameters.name: ImageName
parameters.description: Image name. The length should be [2, 128] English or Chinese characters. It must start with a letter (uppercase or lowercase) or a Chinese character, and cannot start with http:// or https://. It can contain numbers, colons (:), underscores (_), or hyphens (-).

parameters.name: OSSBucket
parameters.description: The OSS Bucket where the image file is located.

parameters.name: OSSObject
parameters.description: The name of the image file.

parameters.name: OSSRegion
parameters.description: The Region where the image is located. Currently, only cn-beijing is supported.

parameters.name: OSType
parameters.description:
Operating system platform type. Allowed values:

- windows.
- linux.

Currently, only linux is supported.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description:
Operating system distribution. Allowed values:
* centos
* ubuntu

parameters.name: TargetOSSRegionId
parameters.description:
The target OSS region where the image will be stored.</br>

> Currently, only cn-beijing and ap-southeast-1 are supported.
